author: Tyto
Nyko
description: GPT3 Chatbot using OpenAI API to respond to messages. Comes with personas with the possibility of adding more!
install_msg:
Thanks for installing GPT3 ChatBot.
Please set up your openai API key: `[p]set api openai key,<your api key>` or the bot will not work.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores each user/guild member's last 20 interactions with the cog, and all a user's data can be cleared by running `[p]clearmylogs`.
